SUMMONS WITH AN ANNOUNCEMENT
(1) If it is not known whether there are any heirs, by an announcement the court shall summon those who think they have a right to inheritance to report to the court within a year of the announcement being published in the Official Gazette of the Republic of Slovenia.
(2) The announcement shall be displayed on the notice board at the court and published in the Official Gazette of the Republic of Slovenia, and, when necessary, it shall be announced in some other manner. If the estate consists of property of lesser value, the announcement shall be displayed only on the notice board at the court.
(3) The court shall proceed in accordance with paragraphs one and two of this Article also in cases when a temporary representative has been appointed to represent an heir due to his or her address being unknown and there being no authorised person, or when the heir or his or her legal representative who does not have an authorised person lives abroad and it was impossible to effect service.
(4) After the expiry of the period referred to in paragraph one of this Article, the court shall carry out the probate proceedings on the basis of the statement of the appointed guardian and the facts at its disposal.
